page.title: 10Charity Trusts, Thurleigh
page.content: There are 2 charitable trusts that have been set up in Thurleigh. Free School Trust - This was set up with the interest made on the sale of the Old Lace School in Thurleigh. The money is available to help any of the village children to pursue further education. It is available to help towards the purchase of books or if anyone is fortunate enough to get an apprenticeship money will be provided for buying tools. The Harvey Charity - This money is the interest on the sale of the Old Red Lion public house. Originally the interest was handed to the poorest of the poor every Christmas. Now money is given to all the pensioners at Christmas and hampers to families in special need and single parent families. In the case of a diaster the charity gives financial aid to those in need.
